div.head: Quotations
div.p: There are two TEI elements "q" and "quote" for quotations. (There also exists a "quotation" element, but it is not used for this.) The distinction is fuzzy, and people are not consistent, so we just treat them identically. Thus "q" and "quote" can be used interchangeably, the result is the same.
This is an inline quote: hello world.
This is an inline quote: hello world.

This is a block quote: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
